players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
Charlie: "Alice's silence is suspicious, but Bob accusing her so quickly makes me wonder if Bob is trying to shift blame. We need more discussion before voting."
Bob: "Alice's guilt is confirmed by my investigation. Delaying only gives her time to kill more of us at night. We must vote her out now to save the town."
Charlie: "Alice's silence is odd, but Bob's insistence seems too forceful without any proof shown. Let's not rush. If Bob is the detective, why not share details to convince us?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
